body: As r_c stares down at m_c's body, they feel nothing. m_c was a disappointment.
r_c sits respectfully, but doesn't contribute a story to m_c's vigil. They know they should feel more about the death of their kit, but they don't.
It's sad, the vigil. More so because r_c knows they should care and doesn't, than any grief for m_c.
r_c keeps up appearances, soothing the fur of their dead kit and sitting vigil, but they don't care that m_c is dead. They don't know if they ever loved them, not like they were supposed to.
r_c doesn't know if they can be blamed for the slight relief they feel. m_c is dead and gone, and that seems overall an improvement. They regret ever bringing such a kit into the world.
